{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CC&C |model=WL-1502 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/24/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PANWL1502 |ic_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8181 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400A-7T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8181 |wi1_chip2_brand=Philips |wi1_chip2_model=SA2400A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''WLAN Broadband Router''
"10-015101-0C" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=40877 On the OpenWrt forums] :This post states that a device with this FCC ID used an '''AMD''' AM29LV320DB-90EI (4MB) Flash chip and 2x ISSI IS42S16400A-7T (16MB total) RAM chips. :The voltage used was noted as 7.5V (the FCC filings indicate 9V).
Probable 00:02:72 OUI.
